title: Derek Kreindler
description: This week Derek Kreindler of The Truth About Cars joins us, we talk about the VW Jetta Turbo Hybrid, RWB Porsches, the Morgan Aero, Nissan Skylines, the new Audi R8 GT, Burning Jeeps and how to find people to have a "crisis" with on the internet.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
